data.message: Why can't we just open our fb messages without the messenger app? I don't like the factor points behind the app. I don't like people having insides to my phone info. Can't we just go back to just getting messages without the app?!?!

replies.message: We understand your concerns, Chelle. Almost all apps must ask for permissions to run. Your trust is important to us and we encourage you to learn more about how Messenger actually uses these permissions here: http://on.fb.me/1vdZOyQ -Chantal

Didn't even answer the rest of your argument/comment..
Nice copy-and-paste answer Facebook "Chantal"

The Messager app does nothing but give them full access to your phones data. I'm never going to download it. Ps Chantal, why don't you read the reviews on your messenger app. You know how terrible that makes you look
No one likes messenger ..... Get rid of it!!!! Baahhh!!
mine is my notification dont update,.. some of friend tag me a photo 3days ago and its still there... need help pls
Why do I have to have messenger what if I had an 8 gb iphone? What if I couldn't install apps to an sd card(android) your basically forcing us to do things we don't want to do
Messenger app is annoying but you guys are gullible - most apps on your phone you use do indeed ask for the SAME permissions lol...

Yeah, I just got the messenger app on my phone recently (and my cellphone mysteriously just got all messed up-I think it's a virus!), and I also don't really like it at all that any "friend" you have can pop up on your screen whenever the wind blows!

Messenger is required because it meets all the requirements for FASCISTbook to share your private information with the government agencies without FB having to do any extra work to supply that information.
I don't want messenger!  Nobody seems to like it!
I AGREE
Opera Mini can see ur message. I use opera mini 2 check out my Facebook
I refuse to download it. I'll just get my messages through the browser. NEVER going to install it.
I downloaded it and all of a sudden Facebook suggested I friend my dentist.  No thanks.  They crossed the line. Not trustworthy.
I have not down loaded it and do not plan to. I get my messages now through my browser.
When i had the messenger app it used all my data in 2 weeks! When i deleted it i never used even half! Facebook is selling out!
Go to Facebook .com instead of the app. You can still see messages and answer there without installing the messenger.

The Facebook App itself is taking the same info. 

My complaint is, if I can't check my messages in the Facebook app, I shouldn't be forced to stare at the message notification. 

I won't get the messenger app, I'll just text someone instead.
Yes and they never answered my question why?!?!?! Can't you just go back to the way it was and not have to have the app?
Unfortunately, I had no option.  They locked me out of the previous messages and forced me to use messenger if I wanted to contact friends or family.
WILL NOT get the message app!!!!!!
the messenger app doesn't ask for anything more then say instagram or swarm, or foursquare, or any other app that you have on your phone at this time
They will probably change it after this, but use Paper. It's still integrated there.
I will never use FB messenger it is a scam and a shame that they block cell phone messages . Thus I may turn off my FB phone altogether!!! Face book why are you compromising our privacy ?
Will never use this app or Facebook app I go through my browser
